title: A Critical Update On Our Freedom Convoy (Ep 1711)
description:
In this episode, I address the breaking news about the freedom convoy coming here. I also address the disturbing comments from the Canadian dictator. 

News Picks:


Truth Social is blowing up.

Crazed congressman suggests stealing trucker’s trucks.


NASCAR fan has a message for a local news reporter.


First recording of a dying brain suggests a “life recall.”
